name: FloaterGuy
description:
My very first (semi) finished game. Has quite a few bugs. Its a platformer without floors (except a platform at the start and end for playabilitys sake).

Put together in a little over 40 hours for the 2018 GMTK Jam.

Movement might be pretty broken on your machine, haven't bug-tested on any other machines than my own >.>

Only has 2 short levels.
